tool_description: Extracts and structures metadata from DICOM file headers, including patient information, study details, and technical parameters.

file_path.description: Path to the validated DICOM file

include_private_tags.description: Whether to include manufacturer-specific private tags

tag_groups.description: Specific DICOM tag groups to extract (e.g., 0010, 0008, 0020)

error_messages: File access error: Cannot read the specified DICOM file. Check file permissions and availability.
Invalid DICOM structure: File lacks proper DICOM header structure. Validate file first.
Tag parsing error: Unable to parse specific DICOM tags. File may have non-standard tag formatting.
usage: Provide file_path to extract metadata from DICOM headers. Optionally specify include_private_tags and tag_groups to control extraction scope.

patient_info.description: JSON string containing patient demographic data

study_info.description: JSON string containing study and series information

technical_params.description: JSON string containing imaging technical parameters

extracted_tags.description: List of successfully extracted DICOM tag identifiers

extraction_timestamp.description: Timestamp when metadata extraction was performed
